verses.verse: Now when Ya`akov <WH3290> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that there was <WH3426> corn <WH7668> in Egypt <WH4714>, Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his sons <WH1121>, Why do ye look <WH7200> <WH8691> one upon another?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that there is <WH3426> corn <WH7668> in Egypt <WH4714>: get you down <WH3381> <WH8798> thither, and buy <WH7666> <WH8798> for us from thence; that we may live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and not die <WH4191> <WH8799>.
And Yosef's <WH3130> ten <WH6235> brethren <WH251> went down <WH3381> <WH8799> to buy <WH7666> <WH8800> corn <WH1250> in Egypt <WH4714>.

But Binyamin <WH1144>, Yosef's <WH3130> brother <WH251>, Ya`akov <WH3290> sent <WH7971> <WH8804> not with his brethren <WH251>; for he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Lest peradventure <WH6435> mischief <WH611> befall him <WH7122> <WH8799>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came <WH935> <WH8799> to buy <WH7666> <WH8800> corn among <WH8432> those that came <WH935> <WH8802>: for the famine <WH7458> was in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>.

And Yosef <WH3130> was the governor <WH7989> over the land <WH776>, and he it was that sold <WH7666> <WH8688> to all the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>: and Yosef's <WH3130> brethren <WH251> came <WH935> <WH8799>, and bowed down <WH7812> <WH8691> themselves before him with their faces <WH639> to the earth <WH776>.

And Yosef <WH3130> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> his brethren <WH251>, and he knew <WH5234> <WH8686> them, but made himself strange <WH5234> <WH8691> unto them, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> roughly <WH7186> unto them; and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Whence <WH370> come <WH935> <WH8804> ye? And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, From the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667> to buy <WH7666> <WH8800> food <WH400>.
And Yosef <WH3130> knew <WH5234> <WH8686> his brethren <WH251>, but they knew <WH5234> <WH8689> not him.

And Yosef <WH3130> remembered <WH2142> <WH8799> the dreams <WH2472> which he dreamed <WH2492> <WH8804> of them, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Ye are spies <WH7270> <WH8764>; to see <WH7200> <WH8800> the nakedness <WH6172> of the land <WH776> ye are come <WH935> <WH8804>.
And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Nay, my lord <WH113>, but to buy <WH7666> <WH8800> food <WH400> are thy servants <WH5650> come <WH935> <WH8804>.
We <WH5168> are all one <WH259> man's <WH376> sons <WH1121>; we are true <WH3651> men, thy servants <WH5650> are no spies <WH7270> <WH8764>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Nay, but to see <WH7200> <WH8800> the nakedness <WH6172> of the land <WH776> ye are come <WH935> <WH8804>.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thy servants <WH5650> are twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> brethren <WH251>, the sons <WH1121> of one <WH259> man <WH376> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>; and, behold, the youngest <WH6996> is this day <WH3117> with our father <WH1>, and one <WH259> is not.
And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, That is it that I spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto you, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye are spies <WH7270> <WH8764>:

Hereby <WH2063> ye shall be proved <WH974> <WH8735>: By the life <WH2416> of Pharaoh <WH6547> ye shall not go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> hence, except your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> come <WH935> <WH8800> hither.

Send <WH7971> <WH8798> one <WH259> of you, and let him fetch <WH3947> <WH8799> your brother <WH251>, and ye shall be kept in prison <WH631> <WH8734>, that your words <WH1697> may be proved <WH974> <WH8735>, whether there be any truth <WH571> in <WH854> you: or else <WH3808> by the life <WH2416> of Pharaoh <WH6547> surely ye are spies <WH7270> <WH8764>.
And he put them all together <WH622> <WH8799> into ward <WH4929> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>.
And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, This do <WH6213> <WH8798>, and live <WH2421> <WH8798>; for I fear <WH3373> 'Elohim <WH430>:

If ye be true <WH3651> men, let one <WH259> of your brethren <WH251> be bound <WH631> <WH8735> in the house <WH1004> of your prison <WH4929>: go <WH3212> <WH8798> ye, carry <WH935> <WH8685> corn <WH7668> for the famine <WH7459> of your houses <WH1004>:

But bring <WH935> <WH8686> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> unto me; so shall your words <WH1697> be verified <WH539> <WH8735>, and ye shall not die <WH4191> <WH8799>. And they did <WH6213> <WH8799> so.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> one <WH376> to another <WH251>, We are verily <WH61> guilty <WH818> concerning our brother <WH251>, in that <WH834> we saw <WH7200> <WH8804> the anguish <WH6869> of his soul <WH5315>, when he besought <WH2603> <WH8692> us, and we would not hear <WH8085> <WH8804>; therefore is this distress <WH6869> come <WH935> <WH8804> upon us.

And Re'uven <WH7205> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Spake I <WH559> <WH8804> not unto you, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Do not sin <WH2398> <WH8799> against the child <WH3206>; and ye would not hear <WH8085> <WH8804>? therefore, behold, also his blood <WH1818> is required <WH1875> <WH8738>.
And they knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not that Yosef <WH3130> understood <WH8085> <WH8802> them; for he spake unto them by an interpreter <WH3887> <WH8688>.

And he turned himself about <WH5437> <WH8735> from them, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799>; and returned to them again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and communed <WH1696> <WH8762> with them, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> from them SHim`on <WH8095>, and bound <WH631> <WH8799> him before their eyes <WH5869>.

Then Yosef <WH3130> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> to fill <WH4390> <WH8762> their sacks <WH3627> with corn <WH1250>, and to restore <WH7725> <WH8687> every man's <WH376> money <WH3701> into his sack <WH8242>, and to give <WH5414> <WH8800> them provision <WH6720> for the way <WH1870>: and thus <WH3651> did he <WH6213> <WH8799> unto them.
And they laded <WH5375> <WH8799> their asses <WH2543> with the corn <WH7668>, and departed <WH3212> <WH8799> thence.

And as one <WH259> of them opened <WH6605> <WH8799> his sack <WH8242> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> his ass <WH2543> provender <WH4554> in the inn <WH4411>, he espied <WH7200> <WH8799> his money <WH3701>; for, behold, it was in his sack's <WH572> mouth <WH6310>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, My money <WH3701> is restored <WH7725> <WH8717>; and, lo <WH2009>, it is even in my sack <WH572>: and their heart <WH3820> failed <WH3318> <WH8799> them, and they were afraid <WH2729> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800> one <WH376> to another <WH251>, What is this that 'Elohim <WH430> hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto us?

And they came <WH935> <WH8799> unto Ya`akov <WH3290> their father <WH1> unto the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and told <WH5046> <WH8686> him all that befell <WH7136> <WH8802> unto them; saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
The man <WH376>, who is the lord <WH113> of the land <WH776>, spake <WH1696> <WH8765> roughly <WH7186> to us, and took <WH5414> <WH8799> us for spies <WH7270> <WH8764> of the country <WH776>.
And we said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, We are true <WH3651> men; we are no spies <WH7270> <WH8764>:

We be twelve <WH6240> <WH8147> brethren <WH251>, sons <WH1121> of our father <WH1>; one <WH259> is not, and the youngest <WH6996> is this day <WH3117> with our father <WH1> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>.

And the man <WH376>, the lord <WH113> of the country <WH776>, said <WH559> <WH8799> unto us, Hereby shall I know <WH3045> <WH8799> that ye are true <WH3651> men; leave <WH3240> <WH8685> one <WH259> of your brethren <WH251> here with me, and take <WH3947> <WH8798> food for the famine <WH7459> of your households <WH1004>, and be gone <WH3212> <WH8798>:

And bring <WH935> <WH8685> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> unto me: then shall I know <WH3045> <WH8799> that ye are no spies <WH7270> <WH8764>, but that ye are true <WH3651> men: so will I deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> you your brother <WH251>, and ye shall traffick <WH5503> <WH8799> in the land <WH776>.

And it came to pass as they emptied <WH7324> <WH8688> their sacks <WH8242>, that, behold, every man's <WH376> bundle <WH6872> of money <WH3701> was in his sack <WH8242>: and when both they and their father <WH1> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the bundles <WH6872> of money <WH3701>, they were afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> their father <WH1> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Me have ye bereaved <WH7921> <WH8765> of my children: Yosef <WH3130> is not, and SHim`on <WH8095> is not, and ye will take <WH3947> <WH8799> Binyamin <WH1144> away: all these things are against me.

And Re'uven <WH7205> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto his father <WH1>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Slay <WH4191> <WH8686> my two <WH8147> sons <WH1121>, if I bring <WH935> <WH8686> him not to thee: deliver <WH5414> <WH8798> him into my hand <WH3027>, and I will bring him to thee again <WH7725> <WH8686>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, My son <WH1121> shall not go down <WH3381> <WH8799> with you; for his brother <WH251> is dead <WH4191> <WH8804>, and he is left <WH7604> <WH8738> alone: if mischief <WH611> befall <WH7122> <WH8804> him by the way <WH1870> in the which ye go <WH3212> <WH8799>, then shall ye bring down <WH3381> <WH8689> my gray hairs <WH7872> with sorrow <WH3015> to the grave <WH7585>.
